short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for words and character count and change case.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wordfy is the go-to Chrome extension for effortless text management. Seamlessly count words, characters of the text and help to change case with a single click, making it ideal for writers, students, and professionals. Whether you're aiming for precision or simply enhancing readability, Wordfy has you covered.

Transform your text instantly with handy case conversion options. Change text to lowercase, capitalize titles, or apply custom styles for a polished look. Copy the results with ease for quick integration into your work.

Streamline your text-related tasks and enhance productivity with Wordfy. It's your trusted companion for precise word and character counts and seamless case conversions.
